data.title: Final Exam Live Search
data.meta_description: Use the calendar and tools on this page from the Registrar's Office to find your final exam information, sign up for text or email alerts, or add exam details to your calendar.
data.text:
Find the Date, Time and Location of Your Final Exams

This is the official final exam schedule, listing the confirmed date, time, and location of your final exams for the current term. Final exams for graduate courses are scheduled only by request from the applicable academic department. Exam days and times are derived from the Final Exam Matrix, which should be used when planning your class schedule. Please use the calendar and tools below to find your final exam information.

Need a Reminder?

Keeping track of your exams is now as easy as a click. By clicking the box next to your exam(s), you will find the following options: email or text yourself exam information; have a reminder emailed or texted to you; or add the exam to your calendar.

For Summer Session final exam information click here.

Please note that exams are not posted (and thus searchable) until the 7th week of each term. To find out the day/time of your final exam, please consult the Exams Matrix page.

Filter by subject:

Use the dropdown menu in the subject box to view final exam information by subject.

Please note that some final exams may not be searchable using this tool. If you are unable to locate your final exam after attempting to search, please contact the Office of the Registrar at academicscheduling@ucr.edu.

Search for your final exams:

Use the search box to look up your final exam information. You can search by:

Subject and Course Number (ex. PHIL 002)

Subject, Course Number, and Section (ex. PHIL 002 001)

CRN (ex. 61732)

*Please note that if your class is in a special time block, it will not be searchable by CRN or section number.
